########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND gnMAX2769_sources
    gnmax_source_cc_impl.cc
    gnmax_source.cc
    gnmax.cc
)

set(gnMAX2769_sources "${gnMAX2769_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT gnMAX2769_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT gnMAX2769_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-gnMAX2769 SHARED ${gnMAX2769_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-gnMAX2769 ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES} ${LIBUSB_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-gnMAX2769 PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_gnMAX2769_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-gnMAX2769 PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-gnMAX2769 RUNTIME_COMPONENT "gnMAX2769_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "gnMAX2769_devel")

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
